title: Fun to watch

title: Wow
text: You just have to visit this wave surfing in a park.  Grab a Wetsuits and a board queue up either side of this FAST flowing river jump in and see how many seconds you can stand before catapulted down the river very entertaining for the onlookers.

title: Unexpected surprise!
text: While in Munich this is a must see!  And better yet, if you're a surfer, a must try!  My son is a surfer and when we found that this river is a spot for surfers, we had to check it out.  We rented a board and he got to experience surfing in Germany!  It was a unique wonderful

title: Really cool to watch.
text: It was really cool to watch the surfers (male and female) surf in the river.  Very impressive.  We watched them following a walk in the park and before we popped into the lovely museum cafe for a coffee.

title: Surfin' in the City!
text: So much fun watching the surfers ride these decent sized waves up close. Great fun trying to get that one awesome photo!

title: Surfing in the middle of Munich
text: We visited mid-morning in a cold February and watched as a group of surfers successfully rode the tricky waves at the Eisbach. Don't miss this when visiting the English Garden

title: Manmade surfer's wave in the local park!
text: This is worth a visit, it is very strange to see someone surfing on a river in the park! This is a short walk from the centre of Munich, and had a small crowd watching the surfers. I believe the river is man made, with the generation of the swell designed into its construction.

title: I enjoyed alot here
text: People do surfing in this place. You have to go inside the garden, and can enjoy the people doing different....

title: A little secret...  but well known to surfers.
text: Awesome to watch the surfers ride the rapids.  Don't have the balls to try this myself, but I support those who do!

title: great
text: cool experience to see locals surf, would recommend staying for more or less 20 minutes, located a 25 minute walk from the city center.If you surf yourself, definitely give it a try.

title: 15 minutes max
text: A curiosity, definitely worth a visit but the adjacent gardens will be a better use of time than spending too much on a blocked bridge under repair and half a dozen locals in dry suits jumping in and out of a 6metre wide water course. Some even looked disinterested.

title: Manmade surfer's wave in the local park!
text: This is worth a visit, it is very strange to see someone surfing on a river in the park! This is a short walk from the centre of Munich, and had a small crowd watching the surfers. I believe the river is man made, with the generation of the swell designed into its construction. If you struggle to get a good viewing spot here, there is a smaller wave further down the river.

title: Must see.
text: I can’t think of any other city in the world where I have been able to watch people surfing. Even in winter there were plenty of surfers having a go. English gardens must.

title: A visit to French Gardens to .. meet a crowd of surfers
text: It was a very cold day (only +1 Celsius) when we visited the French Gardens in Munich. The greater surprise was the meeting of quite a large group of surfers there ...

title: Must see and unique
text: I was with my 15 and 17 year old and they couldn't believe this existed or that people would be surfing in the middle of a city in a stream/river in December.  Kind of cool and great to watch.

title: Daredevil surfers
text: Not for the faint hearted, it was great to see the surfers doing what they do ! the rapids are quite high

title: Interesting view to see surfers in the city of Munich during summer
text: A unique experience to see surfing enthusiasts do surfing actions on the strong current river in the city during summer

title: lie kids pool... small, crowded, almost no waves
text: perhaps in the winter it is great.  in Novemeber last year - there were almost no waves. it was a bit funny, as we are used to see people surfing in the ocean, so it felt like the kids pool.  this year in October - there was no water at all.  but the English garden is a great

title: Surfers in Germany?
text: Believe it or not you can find surfers in Germany, it was amazing watching there skills. Men and women of all ages trying there chances on the waves.

title: lovely to see some waves
text: while covering english garden suddenly you take a pause watching the surfers at this narrow river having huge waves.

title: River surfing in the middle of the city!
text: Munich is basically landlocked yet there are tons of people surfing on a river at the southern end of the English Garten?!!? Yup. It’s so cool. You could sit there all day and watch these brave souls put in their wetsuits and wait patiently on either side of the huge river wave

title: Easy stopover on a city bus
text: Other reveiws are spot on.   it's a spell binding display of very specific surfing skills.   The self-imposed orderly entry of surfers is impressive in itself.  It lies within feet of an entrance to unich's fabuloous English Garden and it' smack on a stop of Bus 100.

title: lie kids pool... small, crowded, almost no waves
text: perhaps in the winter it is great. in Novemeber last year - there were almost no waves. it was a bit funny, as we are used to see people surfing in the ocean, so it felt like the kids pool.this year in October - there was no water at all.but the English garden is a great place. so you can have a nice walk, and take a look for yourself.

title: Surfers in Germany?
text: Believe it or not you can find surfers in Germany, it was amazing watching there skills. Men and women of all ages trying there chances on the waves.

title: lovely to see some waves
text: while covering english garden suddenly you take a pause watching the surfers at this narrow river having huge waves.

title: River surfing in the middle of the city!
text: Munich is basically landlocked yet there are tons of people surfing on a river at the southern end of the English Garten?!!? Yup. It’s so cool. You could sit there all day and watch these brave souls put in their wetsuits and wait patiently on either side of the huge river wave waiting for their turn. They are so well behaved and they don’t bud the line at all. The best views are from either side of the bank but I’d suggest the southern end (left side of the surfers on the wave) and not the right since you may be blocked by the guys waiting for their turn. Just look at the pics and search this place up on YouTube to get a feel for it but nothing more for me to say on here. It’s well worth a visit if you’re in Munich!!

title: Easy stopover on a city bus
text: Other reveiws are spot on.   it's a spell binding display of very specific surfing skills.   The self-imposed orderly entry of surfers is impressive in itself.  It lies within feet of an entrance to unich's fabuloous English Garden and it' smack on a stop of Bus 100.

title: Crazy to see but interesting
text: This was only the second weirdest thing I saw in Munich, the first being the Michael Jackson memorial. but we did stay for almost an hour to watch the guys and girls surf in the city, it is mesmerizing

title: A nice short stop.
text: It was fun to watch for a few minutes. It was crowded so getting to the front took time but once there it was exciting to watch.

title: Surf in the city
text: It was a new experience for me to see surf in a river. Must see place if you go to Munich. Really cold water

title: Surfing in Munich
text: We happened on this surf area and enjoyed watching this free entertainment for 30 minutes!  Some were awesome.

title: Surf in the city.
text: An attraction in Munich, surfing on a waterfall of the Eisbach river on the south side of Englischer Garten.  The Eisbach is a manmade river and is an arm of The Isartor river

title: Surf na Cidade
text: Muito interessante assistir esses surfistas no meio da cidade em um onda que vem de uma tubulação. Fui no inverno , dia de semana e tinha surfista lá.   Vale a visita é legal de ver.   Sem contar que ficam no maravilhoso Englischer Garten.

title: Spannendes Abenteuer mitten in München
text: Es macht fast schon süchtig, den Surfern zuzuschauen, wie sie die Eisbachwelle meistern. Im Sommer ist es voll, sowohl was die Anzahl der Surfer als auch der Zuschauer betrifft.

title: Surf en pleine ville!
text: Il est étonnant de voir des gens surfer au milieu d'une grande ville mais grâce à un phénomène naturelle, c'est devenu possible! Grâce à certaines émissions et autres vidéos internet, cet endroit est devenu "THE place to see"! Il y a plus de gens qui regardent que de surfeurs à certains moments! ;-) Mais on doit aller le voir!

title: Fun to watch
text: Allow time to idle and watch the local young folk try and ride/surf the waves. Quite fun to watch as you pass on your way somewhere.

title: Macht Spaß für Surfer und Beobachter
text: Die Eisbachwelle findet man an einem der Eingänge des Englischen Gartens. Quer über die Straße befindet sich in etwa 5 Minuten Entfernung auch der Hofgarten.Hier lässt sich München von seiner entspannten Seite erleben. Sich an das Ufer zu setzen oder an die Brücke zu stellen und den Surfern zuzuschauen, ist entspannend und interessant. Auch den Surfern selbst scheint es Spaß zu machen, die Welle dort so gut es geht zu reiten.Anschließend kann man durch den Englischen Garten spazieren oder in den Hofgarten wechseln. Dort findet man auch die U-Bahn-Anbindung "Odeonsplatz".

title: déroutant
text: on ne s'attend pas à trouver un spot de surf au coeur de Munich! spectaculaire, à ne pas manquer pour ceux qui aiment la vague.

title: Spettacolo
text: Surfisti urbani che sfidano le onde di un ruscello in pieno centro. Il parco è molto bello ed una sosta questo posto la merita proprio.

title: Sehenswert
text: Ich weigere mich zwar es auszuprobieren, doch ich schaue sehr gerne zu, eine schöne Abwechselung und vor dem ein oder anderen Wellenreiter kann ich nur in Ehrfurcht den Hut ziehen

title: Vores drenges yndlingssted i München
text: Vores drenge (på 10 og 16 år) synes, at dette sted er det fedeste i München. De kunne bruge timer på at se folk surfe på floden - særligt da der kom nogle rigtigt gode surfere. I solskin er det et fedt sted med en god atmosfære.

title: Superwelle mitten in der Stadt

title: Vores drenges yndlingssted i München
text: Vores drenge (på 10 og 16 år) synes, at dette sted er det fedeste i München. De kunne bruge timer på at se folk surfe på floden - særligt da der kom nogle rigtigt gode surfere. I solskin er det et fedt sted med en god atmosfære.

title: Superwelle mitten in der Stadt
text: Für Surf-Anfänger bis Profis findet jeder hier die richtige Welle an der Eisbachwelle. Von der Brücke beobachtet man die Surferboys am Besten. Für Touristen sicher, ob es für die Surfer genau so ist wissen wir nicht. Es ist idyllisch dort mit dem Zugang zum englischen Garten. Es wirkt zwar künstlich die Welle doch da auf jeder Bachseite standen je fünf Surfer Schlange. Sie hatten offensichtlich Spass, vor allem jene, welche nicht gleich umkippten.

title: Cool
text: Really cool to watch this . We enjoyed it . If you can surf it would be better ! Friendly family atmosphere

title: Bei Hochwasser Hut ab , sie sind spitze
text: unbedingt !! muss man gesehen haben !!! man kann dann auch noch im Englischem Garten schländern  , sich den  Moropterus witmen  oder a Mass am Chinesischem Turm trinken

title: Großartiges Erlebnis
text: Wer es kann übt hier seine Surffähigkeiten und trainiert die Standhaftigkeit auf der Eisbachwelle. Sehr spannend und unterhaltsam anzusehen,  auch wie reibungslos der Ablauf funktioniert.....einer links,  einer rechts,  kein Gedränge. Super Sache   hat mich gefreut mal hier zu sein.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Die Sonne scheint, das Surfen geht auf
text: In einer leichten Abweichung vom englischen Garten können sich sogar Surfer üben: Direkt neben dem Kunstmuseum Haus der Kunst testen erfahrene Surfer aus nah und fern ihr Durchhaltevermögen gegen die meterhohe stehende Welle, die durch die künstliche Flussmündung erzeugt wird  des Eisbachs.Ich verbringe Stunden damit, die Surfer hier zu beobachten.  Manchmal ist es lustig zu sehen, wie sie fallen.

title: Ein künstlich geschaffenes Phänomen aus Wasser, ganzjährig im Park.
text: Die stehende Welle im Eisbach am Rande des Englischen Gartens funktioniert ganzjährig und lockt Surfer und Zuschauer gleichermaßen an. Auf der stehenden Welle, die im Eisbach künstlich angelegt wurde, trainieren Surfer ihre Geschicklichkeit und zeigen sie dann auch dem Publikum, was fast immer zugegen zu sein scheint.

title: Spektakuläre Surfer aus nächster Nähe beobachten
text: Die Eisbachwelle ist eine stehende Welle am Beginn des Englischen Gartens. Von Brücke und Ufer aus kann man die Surfer beobachten.

title: River Surfing
text: A very unique sport in a setting! These athletes are super talented and put on a great show for viewers. Also the English garden is stunning.

title: Watch them go
text: We went after Christmas and was pleasantly surprised there were people there. Brother went ahead to check and we came after he found them surfing.It was quite interesting to watch them surf the canal. It was also quite orderly so there wasn't any applications. It would be something interesting to try but looks to be more for someone who kinda already knows how to surf.It's located at the edge of the English Gardens, towards the Hofgarten (which we walked through).

title: Πολύ εξυπνο
text: Διάφοροι άνθρωποι. Άντρες και γυναίκες βρήκαν ένα έξυπνο τρόπο να διασκεδάσουν μέσα στην πόλη. Κάνουν σερφ. Πραγματικά κάνουν σερφ. Είναι κάτι πρωτότυπο που αξίζει να δεις

We rented a board and he got to experience surfing in Germany!  It was a unique wonderful experience and awesome to watch him and the others tackle that wave!

title: الترفيه غير عادية للغاية
text: يتمتع منتزه ميونيخ الإنجليزي بالكثير من المرح لمختلف الأذواق الأكثر غرابة ، كما يبدو لي ، هو خزان يتم فيه ترتيب الأمواج الاصطناعية. هنا الرياضيون يحبون التدرب على الأمواج على ألواح التزلج على الجليد يحبون التدرب. لقد كان من الممتع مشاهدة متصفحي وسط ميونيخ ، حيث لا يوجد حولهم بحر واحد لمئات الكيلومترات المحيطة.

title: Daredevil surfers
text: Not for the faint hearted, it was great to see the surfers doing what they do ! the rapids are quite high

title: Interesting view to see surfers in the city of Munich during summer
text: A unique experience to see surfing enthusiasts do surfing actions on the strong current river in the city during summer

title: Ein Highlight im Englischen Garten
text: Diese berühmte Lokation muss man unbedingt besucht haben bei einem Rundgang im Englischen Garten. Es ist beeindruckend, mit welcher Geschwindigkeit das Wasser unter der Brücke durchschießt und wie dann die Surfer die Wasserbewegungen ausnutzen können. Offensichtlich ein sehr großes Können und viel Geschicklichkeit vorhanden. Chapeau!

title: Atracción muy entretenida
text: Dentro del Jardín Inglés, no te olvides de visitar la zona del río donde los surfistas hacen saltos en estas aguas turbulentas. Digno de ver y de pasar un rato agradable.

title: Watch the surfers at Englisher Garten
text: I followed the sound of fast water when I entered the south side of the English garden to find the surfers.  You can get up pretty close but just watch your footing, as the waves are fast and the surfers pass by you trying to grab hold of the side to get back up and onto the waves again, so best to stay out of their way. Great to watch before you head into the rest of the garden.

title: lie kids pool... small, crowded, almost no waves
text: perhaps in the winter it is great. in Novemeber last year - there were almost no waves. it was a bit funny, as we are used to see people surfing in the ocean, so it felt like the kids pool.this year in October - there was no water at all.but the English garden is a great place. so you can have a nice walk, and take a look for yourself.

title: Eisbach Wave
text: Apesar de ter visitado Munique no inverno e a temperatura estar em torno de 0°, muitos jovens praticam o surf no local, o que deixa a atração mais empolgante.

title: Pflichtprogramm im englischen Garten
text: Es macht einfach Spaß den Surfern beim Erfolg oder beim scheitern zuzusehen. Beeindruckend das auch relativ kleine Surfer dieser Welle gewachsen sind.   Bei schönem Wetter einen gemütlichen Platz suchen und einfach Mal zuschauen.

title: Incredibile
text: Incredibile vedi fare surf ( il pezzo dove lo fanno è proprio solo quello che vedi nella foto) un canale che entra nel giardino inglese sotto un ponte dove l'acqua incontra un dislivello e prende velocità. Ragazzi e ragazze con le mute si divertono a surfare, ma sei in centro,

title: Surf in città
text: Divertente attrazione a sud dell'Englischer Gartner che merita una sosta. E' divertente vedere questi surfisti cavalcare l'onda artificiale sul fiume Eisbach.

title: ...ausser sie surfen selbst
text: Naja, als Attraktion eher überbewertet. Sowieso im Moment, wo alles rundherum umgebaut wird. Ein Weilchen zuschauen schadet nix, wenn man in der Gegend ist. Ein paar Könner und ein paar Anfänger beobachten. Aber mehr als 5 Minuten gibt es nicht her, ausser man ist selbst Surfer.

title: Surfing midt i byn
text: Morsomt å se andre som surfer og faller, på en elv midt i byn. Vel verdt 5 min. Liker du å surfe, så kom.

title: Quelle idée !
text: Quelle idée de surfer sur un petit fleuve, figurez-vous que ça fonctionne et plutôt bien ! Un instant de plaisir et de sourire admiratif s’offre à vous en regardant les surfeurs de Munich... eh oui, pas besoin d’une plage en effet. J’adore !

title: Admirable
text: Surfear en pleno Munich?  Imposible.  Pues si, es posible hacerlo.  Aprovechando una ola que se forma a la salida de un puente, en un río con no más de media docena de metros de ancho, y mucho caudal de agua. En cualquier época del año y a cualquier hora, es posible disfrutar de

title: Surf in città
text: Divertente attrazione a sud dell'Englischer Gartner che merita una sosta. E' divertente vedere questi surfisti cavalcare l'onda artificiale sul fiume Eisbach.

title: ...ausser sie surfen selbst
text: Naja, als Attraktion eher überbewertet. Sowieso im Moment, wo alles rundherum umgebaut wird. Ein Weilchen zuschauen schadet nix, wenn man in der Gegend ist. Ein paar Könner und ein paar Anfänger beobachten. Aber mehr als 5 Minuten gibt es nicht her, ausser man ist selbst Surfer. Dann muss man es wohl mal selbst ausprobieren.

title: Surfing midt i byn
text: Morsomt å se andre som surfer og faller, på en elv midt i byn. Vel verdt 5 min. Liker du å surfe, så kom.

title: Quelle idée !
text: Quelle idée de surfer sur un petit fleuve, figurez-vous que ça fonctionne et plutôt bien ! Un instant de plaisir et de sourire admiratif s’offre à vous en regardant les surfeurs de Munich... eh oui, pas besoin d’une plage en effet. J’adore !

title: Admirable
text: Surfear en pleno Munich? Imposible. Pues si, es posible hacerlo. Aprovechando una ola que se forma a la salida de un puente, en un río con no más de media docena de metros de ancho, y mucho caudal de agua.En cualquier época del año y a cualquier hora, es posible disfrutar de las piruetas que realizan estos amantes del surf zambulléndose uno a uno de manera ordenada.Un espectáculo gratuito, para pasar un rato entretenido, agradable y relajado en este rincón del jardín inglés, que ponen a nuestra disposición un numeroso grupo de chicas y chicos amantes y practicantes del surf.Estas y estos surfers tienen mucho mérito con lo que hacen, gracias a todos. Divertiros mucho, que también nos divertís a nosotros, los curiosos.

title: Bem interessante
text: As Eisbach Wave, ficam no ínício do English Garten, um parque gigantesco no meio de Munique. Dá pra ficar horas observando os surfistas pegando ondas no rio de correnteza bem forte.

title: Surfers in Germany?
text: Believe it or not you can find surfers in Germany, it was amazing watching there skills. Men and women of all ages trying there chances on the waves.

title: lovely to see some waves
text: while covering english garden suddenly you take a pause watching the surfers at this narrow river having huge waves.

title: River surfing in the middle of the city!
text: Munich is basically landlocked yet there are tons of people surfing on a river at the southern end of the English Garten?!!? Yup. It’s so cool. You could sit there all day and watch these brave souls put in their wetsuits and wait patiently on either side of the huge river wave waiting for their turn. They are so well behaved and they don’t bud the line at all. The best views are from either side of the bank but I’d suggest the southern end (left side of the surfers on the wave) and not the right since you may be blocked by the guys waiting for their turn. Just look at the pics and search this place up on YouTube to get a feel for it but nothing more for me to say on here. It’s well worth a visit if you’re in Munich!!

title: Easy stopover on a city bus
text: Other reveiws are spot on.   it's a spell binding display of very specific surfing skills.   The self-imposed orderly entry of surfers is impressive in itself.  It lies within feet of an entrance to unich's fabuloous English Garden and it' smack on a stop of Bus 100.

title: Plán diferente
text: La magia de Múnich representada por este epicentro de surfistas donde con una buena cerveza se puede uno sentar a ver a los más duros del surf haciendo sis mejores acrobacias

title: Lots of fun
text: Had to see this on our recent trip, just a lot of fun to watch these surfers in this urban setting. Spent about thirty minutes on this sunny afternoon which seemed sufficient.

title: didn't do it, but a unique thing to visit
text: Our son surfs, so we went to see this.  Very cool.  Not sure how you would do it if you are a surfer; just show up i think....but really cool to watch.

title: il surf sul fiume
text: Davvero strano vedere persone che fanno surf su di una striscia di acqua.. interessante.. solo i tedeschi potevano pensare una soluzione cosi ingegnosa.. vale la pena una visita

title: Nice
text: Interesting! Great to see so many local daredevils attempt to catch a wave to practice surfing right at the edge of the garden, and in the hearty of the city!!

title: Bem interessante e diferente.
text: Local curioso que precisa ser visitado. Fica dentro de um parque bastante agradável e bonito. Recomendo.

title: Immer wieder cool
text: Surfer mitten in der Stadt. Wo hat man das schon. Einfach chillig, bei schönem Wetter den Surfern auf der Eisbachwelle zu zuschauen. Mitten in der Stadt cool !

title: Crazy young men surfing a narrow bit of river. Entertaining.
text: Walked through the English garden on a tour and caught up with these river surfers, fun to watch and well were the time.

title: A desperate clan of surfers
text: There's really no other way to describe this. It's a narrow fast flowing river where they've augmented the bottom to create a standing wave. The rideable section is 10-15m wide so it's limited to single rider. Watching guys simply step onto their board from the bank and start riding is cool - as are some of the wipe-outs. Otherwise, it's a little sad to see them go back and forth in a confined space - a bit like a porpoise or orca in a tank.

title: Spektakulär
text: Nur die Besten Surfer trauen sich diese Welle zu reiten. Es ist immer lohnenswert hier zu verweilen und zuzuschauen

title: Attrazione simpatica
text: Postazione da surfista in mezzo all'Isar, nell'estremità meridionale dei Giardini Inglesi. Se si passa di lì vale la pena fermarsi qualche minuto a vedere qualche numero con la tavola.

title: amusant
text: amusant de voir ce que les munichois peuvent faire uavec un surf sur une vague de 10 m de large. ce n'est pas mal du tout

title: Crazy to see but interesting
text: This was only the second weirdest thing I saw in Munich, the first being the Michael Jackson memorial. but we did stay for almost an hour to watch the guys and girls surf in the city, it is mesmerizing

title: A nice short stop.
text: It was fun to watch for a few minutes. It was crowded so getting to the front took time but once there it was exciting to watch.

title: even langsgelopen
text: leuk om even langs te lopen ligt aan het begin van de engelse tuin mooi om te zien hoe mannen en vrouwen daar surfen op de golven

title: SURF no Parque
text: Foi a coisa mais interessante que já vi. As pessoas surfando em meio a um Parque, dentre de um "rio" no meio da cidade. Faça chuva, faça sol, faça frio...tem sempre alguém por lá se aventurando nas ondas.

title: Surf in the city
text: It was a new experience for me to see surf in a river. Must see place if you go to Munich. Really cold water

title: immer wieder faszinierend zuzuschauen, wenn....
text: ... mitten in München gesurft wird; sicher kein Geheimtipp und immer sehr gut besucht, aber es lohnt sich bei einem Spaziergang im Englischen Garten auf jeden Fall hier vorbei zu schauen

title: Surfing in Munich
text: We happened on this surf area and enjoyed watching this free entertainment for 30 minutes!  Some were awesome.

title: Surf in the city.
text: An attraction in Munich, surfing on a waterfall of the Eisbach river on the south side of Englischer Garten.  The Eisbach is a manmade river and is an arm of The Isartor river

title: Incroyable mais vrai
text: Incroyable ambiance à l’entrée sud du jardin anglais de Munich. De sympathiques et disciplinés surfeurs attendent sagement leur tour pour se jeter à l’eau sur une vague d’un mètre. Spectacle et fun garantis! C’est une curiosité à ne pas manquer!

title: Fun
text: Je n'ai pas testé mais c'est surprenant que l'on fasse du surf au centre d'une ville.C'est dans magnifique parc ou on peut flâner quand il fait beau.A visiter quand on va à Munich.

title: No dejes de pasar
text: Que en pleno centro de una ciudad como Munich puedas ver surfistas resulta cuanto menos increíble. Pero allí están. Dedículaes unos minutos y no te piersas como se organizan para ingresar a la hola y sus habilidades !

title: Brilliant!
text: Wet suits needed because the river is icy cold. But what a wonderful sight - surfing in the middle of town!

title: Münchens Aushängeschild
text: Es ist immer voll und es sind immer Schaulustige an der Eisbachwelle. Aber wie kann es anders sein? Es ist einfach cool, den Surfern zuzuschauen.
